name: Spinning Circle
description:
Want to play a very simple, fast and addictive game? Then this game is for you. Just match the colors and challenge your self in the three levels of difficulty!

Musics:
  • Reverie by _ghost
  • Empty Rooms by _ghost
  • Coriolis Effect by Mseq
  • Cool Vibers by Kevin MacLeod
  • Between Worlds by Smiling Cynic
